dcterms:creator: Michael Redmond
dcterms:description: The Communities and Crime dataset includes socio-economic data from the 1990 US Census, law enforcement data from the 1990 Law Enforcement Management and Administrative Statistics survey, and crime data from the 1995 FBI Uniform Crime Report. It contains a total number of 147 variables and 2215 communities in the 49 states of the United States.
dcterms:title: Communities and Crime Dataset
